images.description: White version of the company logo, likely for use on dark backgrounds or in the header.
images.suggested_usage: Use as the primary logo in the header/navigation bar. Ensure it's responsive and scales well across devices. Consider leveraging an SVG for better scalability if the original design allows.

images.description: Image depicting a building or construction project, possibly from Tanvald, showcasing completed work.
images.suggested_usage: Use in a project gallery or portfolio section to display completed construction work. Could also be used as a background image for a 'Our Projects' or 'Case Studies' section. Ensure alt text is added for accessibility, e.g., 'Completed building project in Tanvald'.

images.description: Image of the exterior of a family house, likely a completed new build or reconstruction project.
images.suggested_usage: Use in a project gallery, services section (e.g., 'New Builds' or 'Reconstructions'), or as a visual representation of their residential construction capabilities. Ensure alt text is descriptive for accessibility, e.g., 'Exterior view of a newly constructed family house'.
